Thomas Walter Edwards Jr. (November 11, 1929 â€“ March 31, 2015) was an American politician in the state of South Carolina. He served in the South Carolina House of Representatives as a member of the Democratic Party from 1967 to 1988, representing Spartanburg County, South Carolina. He attended the University of Denver, and was a businessman, owning a real estate/investment firm, as well as a farmer. He died in 2015.
